description:
net/smtp: preserve Auth errors

If authentication failed, the initial error was being thrown away.

Fixes issue 5700.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go
PTAL (changed test to include multiline error message similar to issue)

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=56762832416a ***

net/smtp: preserve Auth errors

If authentication failed, the initial error was being thrown away.

Fixes issue 5700.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10744043

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>
